mutants.original_line: return [candy+extraCandies >= maxCandy for candy in candies]
mutants.mutated_line: return [candy + extraCandies > maxCandy for candy in candies]

mutants.original_line: return [candy+extraCandies >= maxCandy for candy in candies]
mutants.mutated_line: return [candy + extraCandies < maxCandy for candy in candies]

mutants.original_line: return [candy+extraCandies >= maxCandy for candy in candies]
mutants.mutated_line: return [candy + extraCandies == maxCandy for candy in candies]

mutants.original_line: return [candy+extraCandies >= maxCandy for candy in candies]
mutants.mutated_line: return [candy - extraCandies >= maxCandy for candy in candies]

mutants.original_line: return [candy+extraCandies >= maxCandy for candy in candies]
mutants.mutated_line: return [candy * extraCandies >= maxCandy for candy in candies]
